text: Pleomele fernaldii (syn. Dracaena fernaldii)Dracaena fernaldii. Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS). is a species of flowering plant that is endemic to the island of Lānai in Hawaii. It is known by the common name Lanai hala pepe.Pleomele fernaldii. USDA PLANTS. It can be found in dry forests at elevations of .
